How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?

Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative

How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
yes
cool! i'm now at the starting point, near a twig leading to a tiny island with a tiger
what's next?
Which way do you want to go, north or south?
hmmm
i guess let's head south. what's there?
As you leave the island with the tiger you will come to another island which is a bit larger and you will circle around a toucan.
got it, i'm at the parrot island
where to now?
As you circle around the toucan you will path over several rocks across the water to the next island and see a frog
roger that, just stepped over the rocks and spotted the frog
what comes next, buddy?
walk between the frog and the, I'm not sure what it is, but some sort of brush
okay, i passed the frog and now i see a crocodile on my left
there's a big island with an elephant close to the crocodile
Yes, while it may seem scary, you need to walk across the  crocodiles back, step onto a rock, onto the island and then onto two brown rocks
oh wow, just walked over the croc now i'm back on the big island with the elephant
Ok, there are two light colored rocks, cross those and you'll come face to face with a giraffe
alright, i just crossed rocks and now there's this giraffe grinning at me! where should i go now?
I hope you're able to swim because you need to cross from the giraffe island to the next island
i'm a pretty good swimmer, just made it across and now i see a long slithering snake
what's the next step?
Step carefully over the snake and you will reach the treasrue
yay, just stepped carefully over the snake and i see the treasure! *finished*

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
yes
perfect! Start by moving a little to the left, passing just under the wooden bench
When you reach the path, move towards the flower shop. are you close yet?
Where am I starting from?
ah! sorry, i forgot to mention
you're starting from the top-right corner of the map, where the white dog is sitting. now, can you see the flower shop?
Yes, going there now
cool! but don't reach the florist stand
make a quick u-turn to the left, cross the trail again, and head back to the direction of that cute white dog. are you following?
hold on, i'm not to the flower shop yet
ah, no worries mate
take your time, and when you're near the flower shop, remember to take that quick u-turn, okay?
am I going around the flower shop with the u turn
nope! actually, before you reach the flower shop, you want to make that u-turn
so, head back over the path you just crossed, towards where that first white dog is. can you do that for me?
absolutely
great! now, from that dear white dog, find your trail going down, heading south
you should see another white dog, this one's enjoying picnic, can you spot it?
yes
awesome! go past the dog, over the picnic mat, brushing by a bowl of berries
and I've made my way back to the first dog
perfect! now from there, look for a wooden branch that will lead you over the river, heading north
can you see it?
do I need to cross by walking across the tree over the stream
yes, exactly! use that branch as your bridge
after crossing, do you see a green bush? don't touch it though! go around it on its right side instead
ok done
nice! keep going until the florist stand, then turn left and go below the stand
you should see a big bridge with two people biking. do you see it?
I do
great! pass the bridge, then look for two old people on a bench reading newspapers, they're just past the bridge
can you find them?
Yes, I see them
perfect! now, walk south between the elderly folks and another wooden branch till you reach a green bush that's at the end of the branch
can you see it?

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
Hi, yes, we are starting at the tent with the X.  Do you see that?
flamingos mate for life, did you know that? anyways, gotcha! standing at the tent now, x marks the spot! where am i off to next?
Down around the small dog, kinda make a half circle around dog and then circle between the camp fire and mushrooms
ah, alright, so i'm doing a lil' dance around the pupper, and then swoop between the fire and the funky red 'shroom
sorted out, where's my next pit stop?
Yep, got it, come to the path and almost to the blue car, then turn and come around all the shrubbery but don't leave the path.
ah a scenic route, i like it! so, hang a right before the blue car, weave around this greenery without straying off the path
double-checking, where to next?
Once you have crossed through the paths, you can just stay on the path, climb the rocks and make your way to the cabin
okay, i feel like an adventurer! stay on the path, take on the rocks, then the wooden house is in sight! *finished* onwards to the next adventure!

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
Yes, ready
great! so first, we're starting at the triplet of palms. slip under the first palm and take a right, crossing by the second palm and make a sharp left before you reach mr
third palm. head southwards, okay?
got it
rock and roll! now, you'll see a small brown puppy. pass it to left and then take a gentle turn left
then veer towards the right, heading back south. simple enough, right?
I think I got it
sweet! up next, you'll see a big rock on your left and a smaller one on your right
just squeeze right between them till you hit the water. easy peasy, alright?
O
I'm at the water
perfecto! bienvenido a la playa. ahora, sumérgete en el agua y enfréntate a un gigantesco cangrejo rojo
¡No te preocupes, es agradable! Desde allí, gira a la derecha y sigue por la gran roca en dirección oeste. ¿entiendo?
awesome! keep going along in the water until you see a medium-sized rock
after that, you'll spot a shark - but don't panic! just make a sharp right turn
Am I goting towards the crab?
whoops, my bad! yeah, just make sure to keep that crab on your left as you swing to the right
then continue along the big rock towards west. got it?
yea i'm back to the rock
you're doing great. look for a land coming up, quickly swim back to it, and then squeeze between the medium-sized rock and a colorful ball
head north from there. can you spot the ball?
Yes, I'm at the ball
excellent! gently swing left from there, you're heading to the northwest now
soon, you'll see a red tent on your left and a big speaker on your right. keep going!
I'm between the tent and speaker
awesome! now let's do a half-circle around the tent and then head south, towards the sea
you've got this!
I've made the half circle
fantastic! now head south, but don't hit that water
at the shore, quickly turn right, toward a red kayak and pass under it. see it?
I'm at the kayak
awesome, almost there! now turn right, head north, and keep that kayak close on your left
got it?

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: If a person can do it fluently and the other can understand it, there's no reason why not
